Non-open source

Microsoft Webview2 Control
Sophos Connect Client includes Microsoft Webview2 which has Microsoft Defender SmartScreen enabled by default. SmartScreen may collect and transmit certain end user information to Microsoft as described in Microsoft’s Privacy Statement and the Microsoft Edge Privacy Whitepaper.
